answers.answer: HiThanks for writing to the forum!The smell could be due to exepients in medicines, protein breakdown, uncontrolled diabetes or even due to dehydration. Increase your water intake and see if it helps.Hope this helps. It is difficult to comment beyond this at this stage. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!

question: i smell a strong smell of pea since i was put on a lot of tablets for my pain in joints i have tried alot of things like washing 3 times a day and change my under wear 3 or 4 times a day and also use wipe toocan anyone help me in this
title: why do i smell a strong smell of pea
